name: Lemon Garlic Pasta
ingredients:
400g dried spaghetti
3 tbsp olive oil
2 tbsp butter
5 cloves garlic, crushed
1/4 tsp red chilli flakes (optional)
1 large lemon juice and zest
1/3c parsley
salt and pepper to taste
parmesan cheese to taste
directions:
1. Cook the pasta in boiling, salted water until barely al dente (8 min). Reserve 1 cup pasta water, drain.
2. While spaghetti cooks, heat oil and butter in a pan. Add garlic and pepper flakes and cook 30 seconds. Remove from heat.
3. When pasta is ready, return pan to heat. Add pasta and 1/4 cup pasta water to pan and heat through adding more pasta water as needed.
4. Remove from heat and add lemon juice, lemon zest, parsley, salt and pepper.
5. Transfer to serving plate and top with parmesan cheese.
